content.answer:
Diana Taurasi is the WNBA’s all-time leading scorer over the course of her illustrious career. Taurasi passed Tina Thompson (7,488 career points) in 2017.



Click below to view the WNBA’s all-time leading scorers.
content.name: Who’s the all-time leading scorer in WNBA history?
content.question: Who’s the all-time leading scorer in WNBA history?
